original: Magnusson, Elis, lektor, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 17/4/95 i Lerdal, Älvs-b. 1., av hemm:äg. o. nämndemannen A. E. o. Britta Magnusson. G. 30 m. Anna ]oliansson. Barn: Gerhard f. 31, Jarl 34, Sture 29, d. 42, Rigmor 45. — Mas’kinistex. av andra kl. 22, överma-skinisitex. 24, privatstud. 24-25, avg:-ex. fr. CTH 28, forts. .stud. i ångtek-nik där vt. 29. Praktik v. maskinverkstäder samt å ång- o. motorfartyg 14-23, konstr. v. A-B Götaverken "^29-30, maskinexpert i Uoyd’s Register of Shipping 30-31, tf. adj. i maskinlära v. navig:sk. i Madmö 31-33, ord. 33-36, tf. kl<tor i fartygsmaskiner m. rn. v. na-vigrsk. i Gbg 36-41, ord. lektor i maskinlära, mas’kiinritn. samt fysik o. kemi där sed. 42. Därjämte lär. v. Gbgs tekn. inst. sed. 36 samt ledare av o. lär. v. sommarkurs, f. utex. ing. f. vinn. av teor. övermaskinistkomp. v. Gbgs tekn. gymn. sed. 39. Planlade o. förestod anb. m. inrätt, av maskin-o. elektrotekn. lab- v. navig:sk. i Malmö 34-36.
translated: Magnusson, Elis, lecturer, civil engineer, Gothenburg, b. 17/4/95 in Lerdal, Älvs-b. 1st district, son of homeowner and councilman A. E. and Britta Magnusson. Married on 30th to Anna ]oliansson. Children: Gerhard b. 31, Jarl b. 34, Sture b. 29, d. 42, Rigmor b. 45. — Second-class engine mechanic exam, 22, over mechanist exam, 24, private studies, 24-25, graduated from CTH in 28, continuing studies in steam technology there in spring 29. Internship at machine workshops and on steam and motor ships 14-23, construction work at A-B Götaverken "^29-30, machine expert at Lloyd's Register of Shipping 30-31, temporary assistant teacher in machine instruction at navigation school in Madmö 31-33, regular 33-36, temporary lecturer in ship machinery with the Navy in Gothenburg 36-41, regular lecturer in machine instruction, machine design, physics and chemistry there since 42. Also a teacher at Gothenburg Technical Institute since 36 and supervisor and teacher at summer courses. Graduated engineer. Won theoretical senior engineer qualification at Gothenburg Technical Gymnasium in 39. Planned and supervised establishment of machinery and electro-technology laboratory at navigation school in Malmö 34-36.
